name: Rabbit and Westlake
description:
English Description

This is a game made in the Chinese water-colour style.

However the colour or paint tools are all very cheap. : )

You can switch your body between a rabbit and a girl, you are the rabbit and the girl~

You travel from dark to light, you are trying to wake up!

A short journey, hope you like it.

My home town is HangZhou~

中文简介

你是一只兔子精Σ(っ °Д °;)っ 

你是一只试图登上雷峰塔的兔子精：）

你是一只做梦都想登上雷峰塔的兔子精(●ˇ∀ˇ●)
